text: I went to the clinic for my annual check-up today.
I had an appointment with the doctor to discuss my headaches.
The doctor's visit was quick; I only needed a prescription refill.
I am here to see the pediatrician about my son's fever.
During my consultation, the doctor checked my blood pressure and heart rate.
I described my symptoms of cough and fatigue to the physician.
The doctor diagnosed me with a minor infection and prescribed antibiotics.
I had to take a blood sample for testing at the lab.
The nurse gave me an injection during my clinic visit.
I received a referral from my GP to see a dermatologist.
My appointment at the specialist's office is at 2:00 PM tomorrow.
I waited in the doctor's office until it was my turn to be seen.
The after-visit summary outlined my diagnosis and follow-up steps.
I had a physical examination with Dr. Smith last year.
The doctor wants to keep me for overnight observation after my visit.
My test results came back normal, which is a relief.
I am returning to the clinic for a follow-up visit next week.
The doctor recommended an X-ray for my ankle injury.
I need to schedule an appointment with my general practitioner soon.
The doctor advised me to stop smoking for better health.
